title: Just wanna see why i'm banned :)
body: I'd like to ask a request from Riot if you guys can, but I have been banned, and I don't know the reason why as I no longer have access to my linked email address and it's password. I'm banned for 5 days as it seems, and my last match was, well around 5 - 6 days ago. Any help for the reason please.

replies.body:
Hello Ligerzz  {{champion:117}} 
Nice name btw.

You must have broken the summoners code.

Please open a support ticket with riot as they are the best equipped to help you
Make sure you make it in the account recovery section if you are currently banned. If not just open it about account management  as you are not trying to recover the account :)

Hope I helped :3
~Reported4Verbal~ OCE~  Always Happy To Help! :)
ARAM Main! In SR, 
Main Support {{champion:37}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:8}} 
Fill Except Top & Jungle

Hey Ligerzz,

You should [submit a Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so you can get your email updated. Check out the [Protecting Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) and [Recovering Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) articles for more information on that.

As for getting information on your ban before that, I don't know if a Rioter will see this thread and answer. If not, just be patient and wait for that support ticket to be answered so you can update your email.

-DTN
